name: Emberlands
description:
EMBERLANDS IS CURRENTLY IN BETA. VERSION 1.0 WILL RELEASE SOON. EXPECT SOME INCOMPLETE FEATURES OR BUGS.

Emberlands is a town simulating game without much in the way of player input. Watch as a town grows and develops before your eyes.

Controls:

WASD - Movement

E/Q - Up/Down

Scroll - Zoom in/out

Arrow Keys - Roll or pitch the camera

X - Toggle walk mode

1 - Normal timescale

2 - 2.5x timescale (Messes with the music)

3 - 5x timescale (Messes with the music)

Space - Pause

R - Resets the rotation of the camera

H - Resets the position of the camera to the closest shrine

Z- Unlocks camera barriers (allows you to clip through surfaces) (EXPERIMENTAL, USE AT YOUR OWN RISK)

Left Control - Unlocks the mouse and camera rotation
